title: Website launch
content: website is now up. testing out cd printing, probably will never sell physical yesteryear media though. expect more soon
Aerialstasis has now been released. Get it here https://soundcloud.com/yesteryear1/sets/aerialstasis https://yesteryear.bandcamp.com/album/aerialstasis

title: Yesteryear at Magickfest
content:
~30 minute set of 10 tracks, 2 of which are unreleased and may appear on future releases.

This set was exclusively played at Magickfest, and will 
never be re-aired.
